jinngine.physics.constraint.contact
Interface ContactConstraintCreator

public interface ContactConstraintCreator

A contact constraint creator is used to supply new ContactConstraint instances when new pairs of bodies starts to interact. By implementing this interface, one can customise which types or instances of contact constraints will be used to generate the final NCP constraints

Method Summary
 ContactConstraint createContactConstraint(Body b1, Body b2, ContactGenerator g)
          Create a new ContactConstraint instance between b1 and b2, using the initial ContactGenerator g
 void removeContactConstraint(ContactConstraint constraint)
          Called when a contact constraint that was instansiated by this generator, is removed from the animation.
 

Method Detail

createContactConstraint

ContactConstraint createContactConstraint(Body b1,
                                          Body b2,
                                          ContactGenerator g)
Create a new ContactConstraint instance between b1 and b2, using the initial ContactGenerator g

Parameters:
b1 - Frist body
b2 - Second body
g - A new contact generator
Returns:
A new contact constraint

removeContactConstraint

void removeContactConstraint(ContactConstraint constraint)
Called when a contact constraint that was instansiated by this generator, is removed from the animation. This makes it possible for an application to react to the event, by for instance removing this contact constraint from its internal book-keeping

Parameters:
constraint -
